methods.name: GetComboGraphGameplayTasksComponent
methods.doc: Searches the passed in actor for a Combo Graph gameplay tasks component, will use component search

methods.name: GetCueParamsObjectsFromContext
methods.doc: Extracts Cue Params resolved Objects (set in a combo graph node) from Gameplay Effect Context

methods.name: GetCueParamsObjectsPathsFromContext
methods.doc: Extracts Cue Params Soft Object Paths (set in a combo graph node) from Gameplay Effect Context

methods.name: HasCueParamsObjectsFromContext
methods.doc: Checks if Gameplay Effect Context has any Cue Params resolved Objects (set in a combo graph node)

methods.name: HasCueParamsObjectsPathsFromContext
methods.doc: Checks if Gameplay Effect Context has any Cue Params Soft Object Paths (set in a combo graph node)

methods.name: SendGameplayEventToActor
methods.doc:
This function is functionally the same as SendGameplayEventToActor (from Ability System Blueprint Library),
except it can be used on actors that do not implement IAbilitySystemInterface. In ue5, this custom version
won't be necessary anymore.

This function can be used to trigger an ability on the actor in question with useful payload data.
NOTE: GetAbilitySystemComponent is called on the actor to find a good component, and if the component isn't
found, the event will not be sent.

methods.name: SimulateComboInput
methods.doc:
Simulate user input for the passed in actor running a combo graph.

This will send a gameplay event with relevant gameplay event data.
